name: Twan Fury
description:
A small game me and my friends made in our own non official game-jam within a 48h limit (Just for fun). Even though there are some bugs, they will no longer be fixed as it is a product of the 48h challenge.

Game has 3 phases:
-Spam phase. Press any key as much and fast as possible to build up
potential.

-Angle phase: Use spacebar to lock a launch angle.

-Scream phase: Use your microphone and scream as loud as possible in it. This is a direct multiplier on your potential! Press spacebar again while screaming to launch.

You can exit the game from the start menu, that's it. Either finish one round and return to the menu at the end, or alt+f4 (I know, but eh, out of time).

Known bugs:
After the credits, starting a new game, keys will no longer be detected as input.
It is possible to sometimes launch (frame perfect) at a 0 angle and thus getting hard-locked in the game. Alt+f4 is the only way out.
